displayName.description: The display name of this Food Item.

displayDescription.description: The description of the food under the display name.

displayEffects.description: The description that is displayed when the food is eaten in-game.

sprite.description: A path to the sprite to use for this Food Item.

id.description: Internal ID of the food item. Needed to render the food item correctly on the statistics page.

effects.description: An object full of gameplay effects.

fruitFrequency.description: Determines how often fruit will appear at minimum (in seconds).

fruitFrequencyRange.description: Increases fruit spawn delay by a random number between 0 and this value (in seconds).

fruitLifetime.description: Determines how long fruit will appear.

fruitLifetimeRange.description: Increases fruit lifespan by a random number between 0 and this value (in seconds).

fruitPointsBase.description: Increases the base value of fruit.

fruitRadius.description: Increases the collection radius of fruit (in px).

fruitPointsMultiplier.description: Increases the point multiplier of fruit by a constant amount.

fruitTicksAdded.description: Adds extra seconds to the time upon fruit collection.

fruitFactor.description: For each fruit collected multiply fruit value by (1 + this value).

fruitCap.description: Increase the max amount of times fruitFactor can multiply itself.

fruitRoundingValue.description: Round the value of fruit down to the next multiple of x.

comboBonusPointsInc.description: Increase the combo score by this amount.

matchPointsBase.description: Increases base points for matching balls

gapGapMax.description: Increase the max gap size before gap value = 0.

gapPointMin.description: Increase minimum points from a gap shot.

gapPointsBase.description: Increase the max points from a gap shot.

gapPointsRounding.description: Round the value of gaps down to the next multiple of x.

gapMultSingle.description: Increases the multiplier for single gap shots.

gapMultDouble.description: Increases the multiplier for double gap shots.

gapMultTriple.description: Increases the multiplier for triple gap shots and above.

gapMinAdjustment.description: Decreases the effective gap size by x pixels for determining the score.

chainBonusChainMin.description: Increases the minimum chain required for a bonus to be granted.

chainBonusPointsBase.description: Increases the base score for chains by this amount.

chainBonusPointsInc.description: Increases the score gained for each chain after by this amount.

chainBonusJackpotStart.description: Further increases the minimum chain required for an additional chain bonus to be granted.

chainBonusJackpotPoints.description: Increases the base score for the additional chain bonus.

chainBonusJackpotEach.description: Increases the interval which this chain bonus is granted.

chainBonusJackpotEachPoints.description: Increases the interval score for this chain bonus.

curveSpeedFactor.description: Increases the base curve speed by this amount.

curveMaxSingleAdj.description: Increases the amount of singles allowed before a clump is guaranteed to spawn. Min 0

curveMaxClumpAdj.description: Increases the max amount of same colored balls allowed to spawn at once. Min 2.

curveMatchPercentAdj.description: Increases the probability the next ball will be the same color.

curveMinimumBallSpeedupCount.description: Increases the speed by SpeedupAmount until x balls appears on the curve.

curveMinimumBallSpeedupAmount.description: Increase the speed of the curve when below a minimum amount of balls.

wildBallThreshold.description: Increases the number of balls before a wild ball spawns.

wildBallPointsBase.description: Increases the base score for a wild ball.

spiritShotShots.description: Increases the number of balls before a spirit shot fireball spawns.

spiritShotRadius.description: Increases the blast radius of spirit shot.

spiritShotPointsBase.description: Increases the base score for spirit shot.

spiritShotPointsEach.description: Increases the base score for each ball destroyed from a spirit shot.

spiritShotPointsMult.description: Increases the score multiplier for points gained from a spirit shot.

spiritShotSpeed.description: Increases the speed of a spirit shot.

shotSpeedMultiplier.description: Increases the shot speed by a multiplier (1+x).

shotSpeedMax.description: Increases the max speed a shot can travel (Warning - High values may cause shots to pass through curves)

multiplierMaximum.description: Increases the maximum multiplier (Warning - multipliers past 10 do not have a graphic).

chainBlastMinimum.description: Increases the minimum chain amount to trigger a chain blast.

chainBlastIncrement.description: Increases the increment before another chain blast triggers.

chainBlastExplosionRadius.description: Increases the explosion radius of chain blast.

chainBlastScoreBase.description: Increases the base score from chain blast.

chainBlastScoreEach.description: Increases the base score from each ball destroyed in a chain bast.

chainBlastScoreMult.description: Increases the score multiplier for points gained from a chain blast.

curveClearEnabled.description: Enables the bonus from curve clears.

curveClearPointsBase.description: Increase the base score from curve clears.

curveClearTicksAdded.description: Increases time gain from a curve clear by this amount (in seconds).

treasureEnabled.description: Allows fruit to be replaced with free daily spins.

treasureSpawnMax.description: Increases the maximum daily spins that can be collected in a game.

treasurePercentChance.description: Increases the chance of a daily spin bonus spawning instead of a fruit.

hotFrogShots.description: Increases the amount of shots that can be fired in hot frog mode.

hotFrogRadius.description: Increases the explosion radius of hot frog shots

hotFrogPointsBase.description: Increases the base score of hot frog shots.

hotFrogPointsInc.description: Increase the score gained from each ball destroyed in a hot frog shot.

hotFrogMatchValue.description: Increases the amount of points given when a hot frog explosion causes balls to slide back and make a match.

hotFrogDecayPerTickBase.description: Increases the rate the hot frog meter decreases (per second). Negative values will slowly increase the meter.

hotFrogGoal.description: Increases the amount required before a hot frog triggers. (Note - a match is needed to trigger)

hotFrogShotSpeed.description: Increases the shot speed of hot frog.

hotFrogDecayDeltaPerTick.description: Increases the delta rate which the hot frog meter decreases. Delta resets to 0 after a match.

hotFrogGapInc.description: Increases the amount of hot frog meter gained from a gap shot.

hotFrogFruitInc.description: Increases the amount of hot frog meter gained from collecting fruit.

hotFrogExplosionInc.description: Increases the amount of hot frog meter gained from triggering an explosion.

hotFrogComboBreaker.description: Increases the amount of hot frog meter gained from breaking a combo.

hotFrogGoalInc.description: Increases the amount of hot frog meter gained per match.

hotFrogGoalCap.description: Increases the max capacity of the hot frog meter.

hotFrogJackpotInc.description: Increases the amount of hot frog meter gained from chain bonus jackpots.

hotFrogDelayFrames.description: Increases the minimum amount of frames required between per hot frog shot.

hotFrogFireballImage.description: Changes the hot frog fireball image to this string.

lastHurrahMultiplier.description: Increases the score multiplier for balls destroyed from Last Hurrah.

lastHurrahRadius.description: Increases the explosion radius for powerups destroyed from Last Hurrah.

lastHurrahPointBase.description: Increases the base score for each powerup destroyed.

lastHurrahPointInc.description: Increases the increment score for each powerup destroyed.

bombsFrequencyBase.description: Increases time to appear at minimum (in seconds).

bombsFrequencyRange.description: Increases bomb spawn delay by a random number between 0 and this value (in seconds).

bombsLifetimeRange.description: Increases the lifespan of bombs by a random number between 0 and this value (in seconds).

bombsExplosionRadius.description: Increases the explosion radius of bombs.

bombsMaxBalls.description: Increases the max number of bombs on the screen at once.

bombsBasePoints.description: Increases the base score for bombs.

bombsEachPoints.description: Increases the score gained from each ball destroyed.

bombsMultPoints.description: Increases the score multiplier for score gained from bombs.

cannonsLifetime.description: Increases the lifespan for cannon powerups.

cannonsLifetimeRange.description: Increases the lifespan of cannon powerups by a random number between 0 and this value (in seconds).

cannonsFrequencyBase.description: Increases time to appear at minimum (in seconds).

cannonsFrequencyRange.description: Increases cannon spawn delay by a random number between 0 and this value (in seconds).

cannonsSpread.description: Increases how many cannonballs are fired at once.

cannonsSpreadSpread.description: Increases the spread between each cannonball (in degrees).

cannonsMaxBalls.description: Increases the max number of cannonball powerups at once.

cannonsPointsBase.description: Increases the base score of each ball destroyed using a cannonball.

cannonsPointsMultiplier.description: Increase the score multiplier of balls destroyed using a cannonball.

colorNukeLifetime.description: Increases the lifespan of color nuke powerups.

colorNukeLifetimeRange.description: Increases the lifespan of color nukes by a random number between 0 and this value (in seconds).

colorNukeFrequencyBase.description: Increases time to appear at minimum (in seconds).

colorNukeFrequencyRange.description: Increases color nuke spawn delay by a random number between 0 and this value (in seconds).

colorNukeMaxBalls.description: Increases the max number of balls destroyed by a color nuke.

colorNukePointsBase.description: Increases base score for using a color nuke.

colorNukePointsMultiplier.description: Increases the score multiplier of balls destroyed using a color nuke.

colorNukeCurveCount.description: Determines the number of curves the color nuke affects. (1 = curve that was targeted)

colorNukePointsEach.description: Increases base score of each ball destroyed using a color nuke.

timeBallsMaxBalls.description: Determines the max number of timeballs that can appear at once.

timeBallsFrequencyBase.description: Increases time to appear at minimum (in seconds).

timeBallsFrequencyRange.description: Increases time ball spawn delay by a random number between 0 and this value (in seconds).

timeBallsLifetime.description: Increases the lifespan of time balls.

timeBallsLifetimeRange.description: Increases the lifespan of time balls by a random number between 0 and this value (in seconds).

timeBallsExtraBonusCount.description: For each x time balls collected grant bonus time

timeBallsExtraBonusTime.description: Bonus time gained from collecting x time balls.

multiplierMaxBalls.description: Determines max number of multiplier balls on the screen at once.

multiplierFrequencyBase.description: Increases time to appear at minimum (in seconds).

multiplierFrequencyRange.description: Increases multiplier spawn delay by a random number between 0 and this value (in seconds).

multiplierLifetimeRange.description: Increases the lifespan of multipliers by a random number between 0 and this value (in seconds).

multiplierSpawnInCluster.description: Determines whether multipliers can spawn in ball clusters. (default - true)

speedBonusPointsBase.description: Increases the base score of the speed bonus.

speedBonusTimeBase.description: Increases the base time (in seconds) before the speed bonus resets.

speedBonusMaxMult.description: Increases the max number of speed bonuses allowed.

speedUpShotsEnabled.description: Enables shots to speed up after a number of matches

speedUpShotsTimeBase.description: Increases amount of time without a match before shot speed bonus resets (in seconds).

speedUpShotsTimeInc.description: Increases amount of time speedup lasts based on x number of increases.

speedUpShotsBeforeIncrease.description: Increases matches required before shots starts to speed up.

speedUpShotsThatIncrease.description: Increases number of matches that increase shot speed.

speedUpShotsTotalIncrease.description: Increases max bonus speed that can be attained from matching.

spiritBlastColor.description: Determines the color of balls removed from a spirit blast.

spiritBlastPointsBase.description: Increases the base score per ball destroyed from a spirit blast.

spiritBlastRadius.description: Increases the blast radius (in px) per ball destroyed from a spirit blast.

spiritBlastPointsIncrement.description: Increases the score gained from each ball destroyed from a spirit blast.

consolationHotFrog.description: Bonus points given when in hot frog mode after time is up.

consolationCannon.description: Bonus points given when in cannon mode after time is up.

consolationTimeBall.description: Bonus points given if a time ball is matched after time is up.
